Package org.restsql.service

Contains HTTP interface classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConfResource Provides access to general restSQL, logging and security configuration.
LifecycleListener Loads properties file from servlet context.
LogResource Provides access to logs.
ResResource Contains core JAX-RS Resource of the service, processing SQL Resource CRUD requests.
SecurityContextAdapter Adapts JAX-RS's SecurityContext to restSQL's SecurityContext .
StatsResource  
WadlResource Redirects wadl request to the wadl file.
XmlRequestProcessor  
 

Package org.restsql.service Description

Contains HTTP interface classes.
